content:
/>
X.ii.4.A.1.c
.
Handling Proof of Substantially Gainful Employment
If evidence of substantially gainful employment is received but not clearly shown, refer the case to the authorization activity to develop for continued individual unemployability (IU).
If substantially gainful employment is established, take rating action under the provisions of
38 CFR 3.105(e)
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 4, Section A - Rating Decisions for Reduction Due to Improvement
citation: Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 4, Section A
